description: Number of independent vertex sets in the n-prism graph Y_n = K_2 X C_n (n > 2).
comments: For n>1, a(n) is also the number of ways to place k non-attacking wazirs on a 2 X n horizontal cylinder, summed over all k>=0 (wazir is a leaper [0,1]). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, May 08 2012Also the number of vertex covers for Y_n. - _Eric W. Weisstein_, Jan 04 2014

formula: a(n) = a(n-1) + 3*a(n-2) + a(n-3)G.f.: (3-2x-3x^2)/((1-2x-x^2)(1+x)). - _Michael Somos_, Apr 07 2003Let A=[0, 1, 1;1, 1, 1;1, 1, 0] be the adjacency matrix of a triangle with a loop at a vertex. Then a(n)=trace(A^n). a(n)=(-1)^n+(1-sqrt(2))^n+(1+sqrt(2))^n. - _Paul Barry_, Jul 22 2004
